Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2013 04:42PM Threecats wrote: Sue, I am 45 and had stereo with abnormal cells (FEA, actually). Had excisional biopsy this week, and am awaiting results. Will go in for post-op Tuesday and get path report then. It is stressful waiting and wondering, especially the part you mentioned about knowing these biopsies could go on into the future. I'm grateful though that the Komen Foundation paid for all since I am unemployed.
Posts.Title: Excisional biopsy. SueInMN fresitabr787
